mapper.select: select to_char(pdh.holiday_date__c, 'DD') as description , pma.absence_period as available from process.dealerholiday pdh join process.maintenanceable_availability pma on pma.dealer_code = (select pc.dealercode__c from process.dealerholiday pdh join process.account pc on pdh.par_row_id__c = pc.row_id where pc.dealercode__c = #{dealerCode} limit 1) where pdh.holiday_date__c > date_trunc('month', to_date(concat(#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||'01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'))::date and pdh.holiday_date__c < date_trunc('month',to_date(concat(#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||'01'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') + interval '1 months')::date - 1 and pma.period1_start::date = pdh.holiday_date__c and pma.dealer_code = #{dealerCode} group by to_char(pdh.holiday_date__c, 'DD'), pma.absence_period

select to_char(pdh.holiday_date__c, 'DD') from process.dealerholiday pdh join process.account pa on pdh.par_row_id__c = pa.row_id where pdh.holiday_date__c > to_date(#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||'01','YYYY-MM-DD') and pdh.holiday_date__c < to_date(#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||'01','YYYY-MM-DD') + interval '1 months' and pa.dealercode__c = #{dealerCode} group by to_char(pdh.holiday_date__c, 'DD')

select generate_series(case when (to_char(ma.excp_start_date, 'YYYYMM')::int - cast(#{year}||#{month} as integer)) = 0 then to_char(ma.excp_start_date, 'DD')::int else 1 end , case when (to_char(ma.excp_end_date, 'YYYYMM')::int - cast(#{year}||#{month} as integer)) = 0 then to_char(ma.excp_end_date, 'DD')::int else to_char(((#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||'01')::date + interval '1 months')::date -1, 'DD')::int end ) from process.maintenanceable_availability ma where ma.excp_start_date::date <= (#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||to_char((concat(#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||'01')::date + interval '1 months')::date -1, 'DD'))::date and ma.excp_end_date::date >= (#{year}||'-'||#{month}||'-'||'01')::date and ma.dealer_code = #{dealerCode} and ma.absence_period = 'N' and ma.type = 'Dealer Employee AvailabilityEx'

with params as ( select date_trunc('month', (#{year}||#{month}|| '01')::timestamp)::timestamp as date_from , (date_trunc('month', (#{year}||#{month}|| '01')::timestamp) + interval '1 month - 1 day')::timestamp as date_to ), week_info as ( select 1 as week_num, 'Monday' as week_name union all select 2 as week_num, 'Tuesday' as week_name union all select 3 as week_num, 'Wednesday' as week_name union all select 4 as week_num, 'Thursday' as week_name union all select 5 as week_num, 'Friday' as week_name union all select 6 as week_num, 'Saturday' as week_name union all select 7 as week_num, 'Sunday' as week_name ) select to_char(yyyyMMdd,'dd') as days from (select (select week_name from week_info where week_num = b.week_num) as week_name , yyyyMMdd from (select EXTRACT(ISODOW from yyyyMMdd) as week_num , yyyyMMdd from --(select generate_series(cast(date_trunc('month',current_date) as timestamp) -- , (date_trunc('MONTH', current_date) + INTERVAL '1 MONTH - 1 day')::timestamp, '1 day') as yyyyMMdd) a (select generate_series((select date_from from params), (select date_to from params), '1 day') as yyyyMMdd) a ) b ) c inner join process.maintenanceable_availability ma on (c.week_name = ma.day_name) where ma.dealer_code = #{dealerCode} and ma.source = #{source} and ma.excp_start_date < now()::timestamp and ma.excp_end_date >= now()::timestamp and ma.type = 'Dealer Employee AvailabilityEx'
